Package: grails.plugins.rest.client

[Groovy] Class RestBuilder

    • grails.plugins.rest.client.RestBuilder

    • Main API entry to the synchronous version of the REST low-level client API

      Authors:
      Graeme Rocher
      Since:
      1.0
